attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop charities operating whom do not supply tangible support eg stop charities from simply describing a problem and then referring to a different charity. Have someone available from the Charities Commission in each local authority to attend each new charity opening to help stem the flood of charities who may take peoples details' visit them at home etc but actually do nothing to help, these people could be identity thieves etc 
This is a massive problem that needs investigation at top level NOW

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
